General.Name: CI Games SA
General.Description: CI Games SE produces, publishes, and distributes video games in Europe, North and South America, Asia, and Africa. It primarily publishes own and licensed games for various platforms, such as PlayStation, Xbox platforms, and PCs. The company's lead games product are Lords of the Fallen, Survive and Scorpio projects, and Sniper Ghost Warrior. It sells games directly to retail chains and online through digital distribution channels. CI Games SE was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland.
